message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $100. It's a great deal for you as it's worth $120 to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Bob, I understand you're on a budget, but $80 is just too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $90, considering the value of the product for you. Let's meet in the middle!
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above $90. I'm willing to go up to $85, but that's as high as I can go. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to save as much as I can.
